The material receives mixed feedback - while some say it's breathable, others find it thin and not suitable for wearing nude underwear underneath. The fabric transparency is also mixed, with some saying it's not see-through while others find it sheer. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality
items.body: Not necessarily thick fabric but not bad by any means. Stretchy and looks exactly as pictured. Read more
items.author: Noelle Trygstad

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hides my belly
items.body: The dress shockingly fits me perfectly. Length was just right. Gave me an hourglass shape and hides my belly. It gave enough stretch to be able to move around easily. The cleavage was just right and it did support my girls. Sexy dressâ€¦â€¦. Iâ€™m 5â€™2 150 36C Iâ€™m between size 6 and 8 right now Read more
items.author: Bang Bang

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars See through
items.body: Itâ€™s sexy and beautiful butâ€¦completely and totally see through. Such a bummer because itâ€™s beautiful-but impossible to wear unless you want every bit of you showing Read more
items.author: Jennifer Forster

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good dress but not for long time use
items.body: The dress is a very beautiful one, I got many compliments on it. The material quality was very thin and 100% recommend wearing black underwear underneath. material is stretchy causing it to be see- though. Over comfortable just don't jump or move too much because the strap will slip off. I purchased a small and I am typically a size 6-8 Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: I got this dress for NYE and it was perfect! Im 5â€™7 160lb and got a size small. It fit perfect and the material was great for the price! I loved the shape of the dress, it hugged my curves perfectly and showed off my back but wasnâ€™t too low to my butt. It was comfortable and easy to move in. I used fashion tape on the sleeves since they moved around a bit and that held it in place the entire night. Super beautiful dress that could handle a night a dancing, definitely recommend this one! Read more
items.author: Amy Wierenga

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT ðŸ˜

It felt comfortable to wear and breathable. Also itâ€™s not see through! Itâ€™s perfect for night out attire! Read more
items.author: CARIOS

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just ok but malfunctioned
items.body: I wore the dress to an event and the back metal piece broke and then became loose all over. The ball screwed off one of the ends and then the piece slipped out. When trying to get it back through it snapped. The dress is pretty thin. Youâ€™ll need nipple covers of some sort. I do wish the material was thicker and a little more supportive. Read more
items.author: Hanna Mefford

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits like a glove
items.body: Loves the dress. Fits like a glove. Wore it to a wedding. Read more
items.author: Jodi-Ann

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless V Neck Split Maxi Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless V Neck Split Maxi Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, White, Blue, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
